<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Compliance Requirement by ID</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/compliance/requirement/{requirementId}"}></MethodEndpoint>



Returns compliance requirement data for the specified requirements ID.
